text:
Good doctor, friendly staff, but damn long waiting times, at least 45mins. Clinic opened at 9am and there were already 10 people queueing. Better to
Wait outside because there are a lot of people coughing and sneezing inside.

I would like to commend on Dianna's service over the phone/whatsapp. She was helpful and efficient in guiding me through the teleconsultation process. Thanks to her support, the entire transaction was smooth and seamless. I truly appreciated her professionalism and prompt response during the entire process from the start till the end with the arrangement of my medication delivered to me. Thank you.

First time visiting this clinic. Pleasant experience. Opens promptly at 8am and the doctor is already in the clinic when I reached at 805am. Most doctors don't arrive on time when clinic opens so I am just happy that I didn't have to spend extra time just to wait for doctor to arrive after getting a queue number. Registration was quick and smooth. My boy was seen by Dr Nicholas Yong. Very pleasant experience and he was quite detailed in checking. Will come back to this clinic again when I have to.
Very polite doctor and spacious seating when waiting for your turn to meet the doctor. Clean and quiet environment too

the 5 stars is for the handsome doctor Nicholas and the receptionist is very very kind and helpful. Feel good when visiting here. The consultation price is reasonable too. But really really long queue, I waited for 1 and a half hour to see doctor today.
